my mams beautiful springer spaniel has jus had 7 adorable puppies in the last 5 and a half hours and is still going i delivered the first one myself and cut the cord and cleaned it up it is a wonderful feeling and ive decided to keep her they are all beautiful and will keep you all posted when she is finished giving birth im so overwhelmed right now life is such a miracle seeing them being born is jus the most amazing thing i have ever seen look out for pictures being uploaded soon xxxxx love to u all xxx
hunnie, wellie, stains, jazz, minnie, whitey, winnie, smudge and dotty new single all face pictures have a look and choose your favourite write comments lets see whos top dog!!!!

comment and rate your favourite puppy in my pictures the one with the most rates by christmas when they go to new homes is crowned the cutest top dog of the bunch go on it will take up 2 seconds of your time to do it i am having one of those puppies myself so im curious which place my puppy will come get your friends to do it to il let u no who it is when the time comes and which puppy is mine xxx

i went out with my mate last night as a school girl (pics are on my profile) and i fell over at the end of the night as i was getting in the taxi i laughed then but it hurts like hell now!! i think i have broken my foot so im off to accident and emergency in the morning to find out im black and blue all over and feeling sorry for myself lol but i had a great night all the same xx

went out again last night and i reckon i may have been spiked.... ive had a bad week with myself seem to get rejected by alot of ppl and im thinkin now why me?? applying for jobs with no success the recent split from my boyfriend and i seem to be makin a complete arse of myself in front of guys recently probably th excess alcohol but hey im new to the dating scene again after 3 long years.. last night was probably one of the worst nights of the year for me. i had alot to drink then all of a sudden my mate is telling me i have fallen over quite alot throughout the night and seem to have lost all control of myself i saw someone laughing at me and i flipped and went for her swearing excessively and flailing my arms everywhere i was dragged away by my friend of which i missed punching the girl by about 3 millimeters then i went back home after having another argument in the taxi cos someone swiped a 5er off me and when i got in the house my ex was there i walkd into the bathroom fell into the bath and he refused to help me up when i got myself up againi helped myself to his freshly cooked bacon sandwich in which he started to have a go at me for doing so... so i threw the plate at him it smashed on the floor and i picked the pieces up and threw them at him bit by bit cutting his hands as he protected his face and cutting my own hands gripping the pieces too hard i then started hurling abuse at him again and picked up the nearest heavy object i could find and threw that at him aswel i must have passed out at this point cos it goes blank from then but i woke up this morning still very drunk and sore from head to toe covered in cuts and bruises
;last night was completely out of my nature and its goin from bad to worse because i feel so ashamed to step foot back in that club again for makin such a prat of myself
;what a night eh???
;please be nice to me xxx
